definitions.explanation_en: A masculine given name of Germanic origin, commonly used in German-speaking countries and other European cultures; often a diminutive form of Johann or Johannes.
definitions.explanation_cn: 源自日耳曼语的男性名，常见于德语国家及其他欧洲文化中，通常是 Johann 或 Johannes 的昵称或缩略形式。
definitions.example_en: Hans was the first person to arrive at the meeting.
definitions.example_cn: 汉斯是第一个到达会议现场的人。
